ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 1
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Be fair Satryic. There s been some introductions and actual information exchanged here. This is just everyone getting to know each other and getting a feel
ygData.messageBody:
Jame Scholl wrote:
>
> From: Jame Scholl <satyric@...>
>
> Is this list just for idle threats and poorly-written posturing? Aside
> from Phoeble's welcome, that's all I've seen so far.
>
> Satyric

Be fair Satryic. There's been some introductions and actual information
exchanged here.
This is just everyone getting to know each other and getting a feel for
how this list is going to work.

Eventually it'll settle down into a dull roar(so to speak) of
information, probably the occassional 'this cool thing happened to my
char' story, and coordination of events and item sales.

Dirque
<This space for rent>
